name: Light The Midnight (Mercenary Studios)
description:
Light The Midnight is a 3d, top-down, wave survival game. Taking inspiration from the spooky but goofy themes of Luigi's Mansion and Plants Versus Zombies, and the gameplay loop of Call of Duty Zombies, Light The Midnight  has the player fighting to survive and gaining upgrades as they progress. More enemies spawn as the waves go on, and the player can purchase more upgrades to improve their odds of survival. 

The Team

Design and Programming : Jake Reilly 

Art: Matthew Ryszkowski, Michelle Quiroz, Charles Pronger, Geno Fontanetta, DeAndre Tucker. 

Sound Design: Ashlyn Parsons 

Narrative and Dialogue: Jake Reilly

Note: There is meant to be a video cutscene that plays during the loading screen. Press "Q" to bypass this and load the game.
